$TNT I promise you next Christmas we'll be on the Nasdaq!!!

$TNT why I build positions and stay to diversification is because stuff operates on it's own timeline. Rule of thumb is keep a 1/4 cash warchest for retractions-- which I'll be honest so many opportunities this Dec I've deployed further than I usually would-- other positions mint profits you take some to the warchest and then spread around to reinforce other positions that have yet to hit targets that you are convicted with.
This has worked really well for me. I never go all in something but I do go bigger than your joker trading gurus suggest.
Which is another point--- day and swing trading doesnt make you big money. Position trading with larger timelines on large positions and traditional long term investing does.
Point is if you're not trying to hit multiples you arent getting anywhere in a rapid inflation reality.
I dont care what crybabies say on any position I am in--- they always sell something before true price discovery.
Happy Holidays fam.
